product_name: Riot Edge 13 Kayak with Skeg - Special Buy
long_description: The sleek Riot Edge 13 ft. Kayak offers a nice blend of primary and secondary stability and puts long day trips and short overnights within reach. High stability makes the Riot Edge 13 friendly to any paddler, and 13 ft. length offers performance in flatwater, sheltered bays and slow-moving rivers. Rotomolded polyethylene construction offers performance, rugged durability and affordability. Retractable skeg enhances tracking and reduces the tendency of the kayak to veer off course in strong winds. Integrated thighbraces and adjustable footbraces ensure a comfortable paddling position for any size of paddler. Bow and stern hatches feature easy-to-use covers that seal securely, and rear bulkhead enhances flotation when hatch is sealed. The Riot Edge 13 ft. Kayak features reflective perimeter line, bungee rigging fore and aft of cockpit and a drainplug. Special buy.
short_description: The sleek Riot Edge 13 ft. Kayak offers a nice blend of primary and secondary stability and puts long day trips and short overnights within reach.
